text: general provisions as to fish and game lawful methods of taking amend rsa ii to read as follows a full automatic rifle shall not be used at any time nor shall a rifle be used to which is attached a magazine or clip holding more than cartridges nor shall a full jacketed metal case bullet be used a rifle may be used provided it is loaded with no more than rounds of ammunition at any time a full jacketed metal case bullet shall not be used either in its original form or any alteration thereof
